inputs.prompt: A dynamic, cinematic shot of a short Black man sprinting directly toward the camera at full speed, wearing a fitted black athletic shirt with bold white text on the chest that reads “Z TURBO.” Thick white smoke trails behind him as he runs, billowing dramatically across the ground like rocket exhaust. His expression is intense and determined, eyes locked forward, sweat catching the light. The environment is an empty urban street at dusk with soft orange streetlights cutting through the haze. The camera is positioned low and slightly tilted upward, creating a powerful sense of speed and momentum. Motion blur streaks across the background while the runner remains sharp in the center frame. High-contrast lighting, cinematic color grading, ultra-realistic textures, dramatic shadows, shallow depth of field, 4K realism, slow-motion particles, volumetric smoke, global illumination, film-quality visual effects.
